info.title: Planty API
info.description: A REST API for Planty - tracking plant care and growth metrics

put.summary: Update a user's role and permissions

post.summary: Store Google OAuth tokens (called by frontend after callback)
Sync plant care tasks to Google Tasks

400.description: Invalid request or email already exists

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of plants to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order: date_asc, date_desc, name_asc, name_desc

notes.example: Time to water your Fiddle Leaf Fig. Remember to check soil moisture first.

access_token.description: The access token from Google OAuth

expires_at.description: Unix timestamp when the token expires

refresh_token.description: The refresh token from Google OAuth (optional)

days_ahead.description: Number of days in the future to sync tasks

replace_existing.description: Whether to replace existing tasks or only add new ones
